item.title: Senior BigData Developer
item.description:
**Project Description:** During the 2008 financial crisis, many big banks failed or faced issues due to liquidity issues. Lack of liquidity can kill any financial institution over the night. That's why it's so critical to constantly monitor liquidity risks and properly maintain collaterals. We are looking for a number of talented developers, who would like to join our team in Pune, which is building liquidity risk and collateral management platform for one of the biggest investment banks over the globe. The platform is a set of front-end tools and back-end engines. Our platform helps the bank to increase efficiency and scalability, reduce operational risk and eliminate the majority of manual interventions in processing margin calls. Responsibilities:The candidate will work on development of new functionality for Liqudity Risk platform closely with other teams over the globe. **Mandatory Skills Description:** - BigData experience (6 years+); - Java/python J2EE, Spark, Hive; - SQL Databases; UNIX Shell; - Strong Experience in Apache Hadoop, Spark, Hive, Impala, Yarn, Talend, Hue; - Big Data Reporting, Querying and analysis.
**Nice-to-Have Skills:** - Apache Hadoop, Spark, Hive, Impala, Yarn, Talend, Hue - Spark Calculators based on business logic/rules - Basic performance tuning and troubleshooting knowledge - Experience with all aspects of the SDLC - Experience with complex deployment infrastructures - Knowledge in software architecture, design and testing - Data flow automation (Apache NiFi, Airflow etc) - Understanding of difference between OOP and Functional design approach - Understanding of an event driven architecture - Spring, Maven, GIT, uDeploy; **Languages:** English: B2 Upper Intermediate

item.title: Senior Java with Big data
item.description:
**Project Description:**
Embark on a transformative journey with our revolutionary cross-asset data management platform, designed to redefine the landscape of global finance. Our next-generation platform stands at the forefront of innovation, meticulously crafted to deliver globally consistent data and pioneering tools. Aimed at empowering trade and sales clients, this platform is the cornerstone for executing business strategies with precision and agility.
Built upon a robust big data architecture, our platform is not only highly scalable but also primed for the cloud era. It serves as the bedrock for industry-leading analytics, offering unparalleled client reporting, regulatory compliance, and a suite of solutions for surveillance, supervisory reporting, and data science, affectionately known as "data flame." Our project leverages a sophisticated tech stack comprising Java, Scala, Spring, SQL, Kafka, and Hadoop, setting a new standard for excellence.
**Opportunity:**
We are in search of an exceptional Senior Java Developer, someone who embodies leadership, innovation, and technical prowess. The ideal candidate is not just a developer but a visionary, capable of working synergistically within a team, mentoring peers, engaging stakeholders, and taking full accountability for the team's outputs and the success of assigned activities.
As the Tech Lead, you will be at the helm of a dynamic development team, comprising 2 Senior and 2 Regular Java Developers. This role is a rare opportunity to delve deep into the realm of big data within the prestigious environment of an international bank, enhancing your expertise and shaping the future of financial data management.
**Responsibilities:**
- Analyze and transition from existing systems to our cutting-edge solution. - Architect and design the blueprint of the new platform. - Develop components to support existing functionalities and new business demands. - Optimize for scalability and performance. - Integrate with a variety of external data sources including Storm, JDBC, KDB+, websockets, REST services, and flat files. - Lead and manage a high-caliber team to success.
**Mandatory Skills:**
- At least 1 year of Big Data development experience, with hands-on expertise in Spark programming. - Comprehensive development skills, including: - API design and construction in Java; - Java server-side or back-end development; - Mastery of Core Java, Java collections, and multithreading; - Java Memory Management; - Advanced SQL knowledge. - A deep understanding of distributed systems and CI/CD workflows. - Proficiency in Linux. - Exceptional problem-solving capabilities. - A proactive, enthusiastic attitude with a keenness to learn and adapt.
**Nice-to-Have Skills:**
- Proficiency in Apache Spark and in-memory databases. - Experience with the Hadoop ecosystem. - Financial sector experience. - Over 1 year of Machine Learning experience, in Java or Python.
**Language Requirements:**
- English: B2 Upper Intermediate
Join us in this ambitious project to forge the future of financial data management, leveraging cutting-edge technology to drive innovation and excellence. Your journey with us will be one of challenge, growth, and unparalleled opportunity.
